overview: Comedian Patrick McKenna seeks a diagnosis for Adult ADHD and learns the facts from an impressive array of experts (some of whom have ADHD themselves!) including medical researchers, psychiatrists, psychologists, professors, and award-winning authors. Along the way Patrick reveals how his life as a husband and father are affected by ADD and even shares candid moments as he and his wife Janis work on the steps toward his diagnosis.
tagline: a ground-breaking blend of humor, hope, and science that dispels the myths about a controversial disorder - Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.
title: ADD & Loving It?!
